from notebookutils import mssparkutils
 
db_name: str = 'odw_harmonised_db'
table_name: str = 'appeals_folder'

@logging_to_appins
def test_table_exists(db_name: str, table_name: str) -> bool:
    spark.sql(f"USE {db_name}")
    tables_df: DataFrame = spark.sql("SHOW TABLES")
    table_names: list = [row['tableName'] for row in tables_df.collect()]
    return table_name in table_names
 
if test_table_exists(db_name, table_name):
    logInfo(f"Table {db_name}.{table_name} exists in harmonised, updating the harmonised layer")
else:
    logInfo(f"Table {db_name}.{table_name} doesn't exist, creating table first.")
    mssparkutils.notebook.run("/py_odw_harmonised_table_creation",300,{'specific_table': table_name } )
    logInfo(f"Table {db_name}.{table_name} created")

# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (horizon tables) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.casework tables)
- **New Data:** where an main Reference in the source does not exist in the target, then NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Reference Fields in source and in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an Reference info in the target exists but the same identifyers don't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View appeals_folder is created

%%sql
-- Build appeals_folder table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW appeals_folder_new

     AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.id IS NULL
        THEN T3.HorizonAppealFolderId
        ELSE NULL
    END                             AS HorizonAppealFolderId,
    T1.id                           AS ID,
    T1.casereference	            AS CaseReference,
    T1.displaynameenglish	        AS DisplayNameEnglish,
    T1.displaynamewelsh	            AS DisplayNameWelsh,
    T1.parentfolderid	            AS ParentFolderID,
    T1.casenodeid	                AS CaseNodeId,
    T1.casestage	                AS CaseStage,
    T2.SourceSystemID               AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)  AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                            AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T1.id,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.casereference,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.displaynameenglish,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.displaynamewelsh,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.parentfolderid,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.casenodeid,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.casestage,'.')
        ))                          AS RowID, -- this hash should contain all the defining fields
    'Y'                             AS IsActive,
    T3.IsActive                     AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_appeals_folder T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 
    ON "DocumentTree" = T2.Description AND 
        T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.appeals_folder T3 
    ON T1.id = T3.ID AND 
        T3.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
    -- flags new data        
    (CASE
        WHEN T1.casereference = T3.CaseReference AND md5(
            concat(
                IFNULL(T1.id,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.casereference,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.displaynameenglish,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.displaynamewelsh,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.parentfolderid,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.casenodeid,'.'),
                IFNULL(T1.casestage,'.')
            )) <> T3.RowID  -- same record, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T3.ID IS NULL -- new record
        THEN 'Y'
    ELSE 'N'
    END  = 'Y' )
    AND T1.id IS NOT NULL
    AND NOT(T1.id = '29309932' AND T1.casestage = 'Initial Documents') --- Hardcoded exception as per Gareth request for data consistency
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_appeals_folder)

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **casework_all_appeals_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View appeals_folder_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW appeals_folder_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 
SELECT 
    HorizonAppealFolderId,
    ID,
    CaseReference,
    DisplayNameEnglish,
    DisplayNameWelsh,
    ParentFolderID,
    CaseNodeId,
    CaseStage,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    

From appeals_folder_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'
SELECT
    
    HorizonAppealFolderId,
    ID,
    CaseReference,
    DisplayNameEnglish,
    DisplayNameWelsh,
    ParentFolderID,
    CaseNodeId,
    CaseStage,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.appeals_folder
WHERE ID IN (SELECT ID FROM appeals_folder_new WHERE HorizonAppealFolderId IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM appeals_folder_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW appeals_folder_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    HorizonAppealFolderId,
    ID,
    CaseReference,
    DisplayNameEnglish,
    DisplayNameWelsh,
    ParentFolderID,
    CaseNodeId,
    CaseStage,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM appeals_folder_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View appeals_folder_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key (i.e. AllAppealsID), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised_db.appeals_folder is updated

%%sql
-- merge into dim table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.appeals_folder AS Target
USING appeals_folder_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.HorizonAppealFolderId = Target.HorizonAppealFolderId AND Target.IsActive = 'Y'

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows

WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (
        HorizonAppealFolderId,
        ID,
        CaseReference,
        DisplayNameEnglish,
        DisplayNameWelsh,
        ParentFolderID,
        CaseNodeId,
        CaseStage,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive    
        )
    VALUES (
        Source.HorizonAppealFolderId,
        Source.ID,
        Source.CaseReference,
        Source.DisplayNameEnglish,
        Source.DisplayNameWelsh,
        Source.ParentFolderID,
        Source.CaseNodeId,
        Source.CaseStage,
        Source.SourceSystemID,
        Source.IngestionDate,
        Source.ValidTo,
        Source.RowID,
        Source.IsActive)

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised_db.appeals_folder is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new appeals_folder

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.appeals_folder

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY CaseReference NULLS LAST) AS  HorizonAppealFolderId	,
    ID,
    CaseReference,
    DisplayNameEnglish,
    DisplayNameWelsh,
    ParentFolderID,
    CaseNodeId,
    CaseStage,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.appeals_folder;
